source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_SEQ_00<tab>Latool Ja is doing a fine job of holding the fort in Martyn's absence.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_SEQ_00<tab>ウルダハの泣男のラトージャは、冒険者を待っていたようだ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_SEQ_01<tab>Latool Ja informs Martyn that you have learned the Glower spell, prompting your mentor to ignore the chirurgeon's advice once again and leave his sickbed to congratulate you. This achievement, however, pales in comparison to another piece of welcome news he has received─Whastrach has successfully delivered the medicine to the Whalaqee and the epidemic afflicting them has been eradicated. Unfortunately, Martyn's jubilations are short-lived when Ceadda, the young chirurgeon of the New World tribe, arrives with ill tidings. Whastrach has apparently taken lands sacred to the Whalaqee as his own, in an obvious attempt to seize the ceruleum-rich Lapis Canyon. Martyn is livid at the treachery of the man in whom he placed his trust, and rushes off to confront him at the processing plant in northern Thanalan.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_SEQ_01<tab>泣男のラトージャと話し、マーティンからワラキ族の疫病が撲滅されたと聞いた。だが、ワラキ族の少年シーダがやって来て、ヴァストラッハが部族の聖地を奪ったという。療養中のマーティンが激昂して駆けていった。北ザナラーンの青燐精製所で「マーティン」を探そう。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_SEQ_02<tab>You arrive to find Martyn and Ceadda already in the midst of a heated debate with Whastrach. The self-styled businessman states that the Whalaqee lands were acquired through a legally binding contract in exchange for the shipment of medicine and that the ceruleum mine he plans to open will give the Whalaqee an opportunity to become part of the modern world. Ceadda and Martyn vehemently disagree, saying that the elders were tricked into the agreement and that it is not for Whastrach to decide how they should live their lives. As the two sides reach an impasse, Royse interrupts to make a surprising revelation─not only is she Whastrach's financial backer, but she also told him of Martyn's plan to produce medicine for the Whalaqee. Although she was unaware of the extent of Whastrach's plans, she cannot decide which side of the argument she should support. To settle the matter, she suggests that Martyn and Whastrach meet in the Celestium and battle as blue mages, and promises to withdraw her investment should Martyn win. However, if he loses, he will be forced to persuade the Whalaqee to surrender their lands as per the agreement. Since Martyn is still recovering from his earlier injuries, you are selected to take his place, assuming the guise of “Azuro the Second.”
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_SEQ_02<tab>マーティンを見つけた。青燐水目的でワラキ族の土地を奪ったヴァストラッハと、ワラキ族の文化を守ろうとするマーティンは激しく対立する。ロイスが現れ、対立の決着を闘技場で青魔道士対決を行って決めることになった。そして、療養中の身のマーティンに代わって、冒険者が戦うことになる。ミルバネス礼拝堂付近の「ロイス」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_SEQ_03<tab>Back in Ul'dah, you participate in a practice demonstration of your spells, bedecked in your new Masked Carnivale outfit. It is then that Whastrach enters dressed as the terrifying Azulmagia, resembling a demon in more than simply outward appearance. You finally understand why his prowess as a blue mage is held in such high regard, as he unleashes an array of astonishingly potent magicks.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_SEQ_03<tab>ロイスと話し、冒険者は二代目マスク・ザ・ブルーの衣装合わせをした。ヴァストラッハの方はアポカリョープスの衣装で戦うようだ。ミルバネス礼拝堂付近の「ロイス」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_SEQ_04With your climactic encounter on the horizon, Royse suggests entering matches against her pit fiends first to hone your skills before facing your mentor's hated rival. Azulmagia awaits you in the final stage of the Masked Carnivale, but will your blue magic be enough to overcome him?

※The next blue mage quest will be available from Latool Ja after completing stage 25 of the Masked Carnivale.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_SEQ_04ロイスと話した。冒険者は青魔道士としての修行を終え、晴れてマスクカーニバルの闘士となった。ワラキ族の聖地を取り戻すため、打倒アポカリョープスを目指し、マスクカーニバルに挑戦しよう！

※マスクカーニバルのステージ25をクリアすると、ミルバネス礼拝堂付近の泣男のラトージャから次の青魔道士クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_TODO_00<tab>Search for Martyn at the Ceruleum Processing Plant in northern Thanalan.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_TODO_00<tab>青燐精製所のマーティンを探す

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Royse in Ul'dah.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_TODO_01<tab>ウルダハのロイスと話す

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Royse.

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_LATOOLJA_100_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> learn Glower? Oh... <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> will master it soon. Latool Ja believe in you!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_LATOOLJA_100_000)) (( )) 02 /var>さん。
青魔道士と、して素晴らしく成長した、ようです、が、
青魔法「グラワー」を、ラーニングして、いないよう、です。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_SYSTEM_100_001<tab>The next blue mage quest will be available from Latool Ja upon learning Glower.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_SYSTEM_100_001青魔法「グラワー」をラーニングすると、泣男のラトージャから、
次の青魔道士クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_LATOOLJA_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> learned Glower, yes? Then <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> succeeded, just as Martyn said.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_LATOOLJA_000_000)) (( )) 02 /var>さん。
どうや、ら青魔法「グラワー」を、ラーニングし、
存分、に腕を磨いて、きたようです、ね。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_LATOOLJA_000_001<tab>Latool Ja will tell Martyn.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_LATOOLJA_000_001それで、は、療養中の先生、を、
呼んでくることにし、ます。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_000_002<tab>You did it, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! You've done me proud! And that's not the only cause for celebration...
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_000_002)) (( )) 02 /var>君！
あれから、ヴァストラッハは大量の治療薬を作り、
新大陸へと贈り届け、ワラキ族を救うことに成功したそうだ！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_000_003<tab>I received a missive saying that Whastrach was as good as his word─the medicine worked and the Whalaqee are saved!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_000_003<tab>とにかく、疫病は撲滅され、ワラキ族の未来は安泰に……

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_NEWWORLDBOY_000_004<tab>(-Young Man-)Martyn! I've been looking everywhere for you!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_NEWWORLDBOY_000_004<tab>(-少年の声-)マーティン、やっと見つけた！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_000_005<tab>Ceadda!? How did you get here?
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_000_005シーダじゃないか！
なぜ、エオルゼアに……！？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_NEWWORLDBOY_000_006<tab>Never mind that! I have something urgent to tell you!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_NEWWORLDBOY_000_006マーティンに報せたいことがあって、交易船に乗ってきたんだ。
部族が、ワラキ族が大変なんだよ……！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_000_007<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, this is Ceadda, the Whalaqee chirurgeon I told you about. He learned to speak the common tongue of Eorzea, and─
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_000_007ええっと、)) (( )) 02 /var>……
彼は、以前に話したワラキ族の呪術医、シーダだ。
ものすごく優秀でね、共通語もすぐにマスターしたほどで……

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_NEWWORLDBOY_000_008<tab>Will you listen!? It's Whastrach─he brought the medicine, and everyone with the disease has been cured.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_NEWWORLDBOY_000_008そんなことより、話を聞いておくれよ！
ヴァストラッハが持ってきた治療薬のおかげで、
ワラキ族のみんなは、元気になったんだ！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_NEWWORLDBOY_000_009<tab>But he wasn't content to simply give it to us─he's used it to lay claim to Lapis Canyon!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_NEWWORLDBOY_000_009でも、あいつはその功績を振りかざして、
言葉巧みに僕たちの聖地、「青の谷」を奪ったんだ！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_000_010<tab>But why would he...?
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_000_010青の谷を……?
まさか……

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_100_010<tab>Of course! The ceruleum!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_100_010<tab>奴の狙いは、青燐水だったのか……！！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_000_011<tab>Lapis Canyon is sacred ground, and glows a bright blue because of all the ceruleum beneath the surface.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_000_011青の谷は、私も一度、訪れたことがある。
地下から染み出した青燐水の影響で、
谷全体が群青で染め上げられた、それは美しい場所なんだ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_000_012<tab>That bastard was after it from the beginnin'. He must be at the processin' plant! Come on, Ceadda─let's go!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_000_012ヴァストラッハは、最初からそれを狙って……。
こうしてはいられない、彼に断固抗議しにゆこう！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_LATOOLJA_000_013<tab>Martyn, stop! Ah... Very quick for man who lie in bed for many days.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_LATOOLJA_000_013ああ、先生！
まだそん、な無理を、しちゃダ、メ……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_LATOOLJA_000_014<tab>Can <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> go with them? I worry that Martyn bite off more than Martyn can swallow. Or is that “chew?”
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_LATOOLJA_000_014)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、
申し訳ありま、せんが先生を、連れ戻してくれま、せんか？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_LATOOLJA_100_015<tab>As far as Latool Ja know, processing plant in northern Thanalan. Make sure Martyn not do anything stupid!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_LATOOLJA_100_015きっとヴァストラッハさ、んの商会が仕事、をしてい、る、
北ザナラーンの、「青燐精製所」へ、向かったは、ず。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_LATOOLJA_000_018<tab>Martyn never listen to chirurgeon. Martyn never listen to anyone.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_LATOOLJA_000_018先生はまだ、療養中の、身。
申し訳ありません、が、先生を、連れ戻してくだ、さい。
北ザナラーンの、「青燐精製所」へ、向かったは、ず。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_NEWWORLDBOY_100_018<tab>The Whalaqee have lived in the light of Lapis Canyon for generations. We can't let it be destroyed by Whastrach's men!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_NEWWORLDBOY_100_018青の谷は、僕たちワラキ族が先祖代々崇拝してきた、
大事な聖地なんだ……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_WHASTRACH_100_019<tab>Why must he be so stubborn?
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_WHASTRACH_100_019<tab>まったく、面倒ごとは勘弁だよ……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_000_020<tab>You only gave them the medicine so you could steal Lapis Canyon!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_000_020ひどいじゃないか君！
疫病を治したのをいいことに、
青燐水目的でワラキ族の聖地を奪うなんて……！！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_WHASTRACH_000_021<tab>"Steal?“ Don't speak to me like some common thief! I won't deny that obtaining the ceruleum was my primary concern, but we signed an agreement. It's all perfectly legal, I assure you.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_WHASTRACH_000_021奪うとは人聞きが悪いな……。
確かに青燐水のために、彼らの土地を手に入れたが、
きちんと法に基づいて適切に買い取ったまでのことさ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_NEWWORLDBOY_000_022<tab>You know full well the elders can't read Eorzean! You told them that if they didn't sign the contract, they couldn't have the medicine. And besides, your laws don't apply to the Whalaqee!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_NEWWORLDBOY_000_022エオルゼアの文字を読めない長老は、
薬を譲るための契約書だと教えられ、サインしてしまったんだ！
そもそも、僕らにウルダハの法律なんて関係ない！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_WHASTRACH_000_023<tab>Even so, I expect your elders to honor the promise they made, legally binding or not.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_WHASTRACH_000_023確かに、新大陸でウルダハの法は適用されないだろう。
だが、人と人との約束は、守らねばならないというのは、
文化は違えども、世界共通の規範であるはずだ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_WHASTRACH_000_024<tab>Perhaps you have forgotten that the medicine was paid for and produced by my company. Before the negotiations began, I had already spent vast amounts to manufacture a large enough shipment to treat everyone.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_WHASTRACH_000_024現に我が商会は約束どおり、莫大な資金を投じて作った治療薬を、
惜しげもなく差し出し、ワラキ族の命を救ったのだぞ？
感謝されども、批判される筋合いはない。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_WHASTRACH_000_025<tab>I saved your tribe from annihilation, and this is how you repay me? I've given you all a second chance to lead healthy, productive lives.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_WHASTRACH_000_025そうして、契約を後悔できるのも、命あればこそ……
せっかく得た未来なのだ、人の邪魔をせず、有意義に使いたまえ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_NEWWORLDBOY_000_026<tab>You took advantage of our suffering so that you could plunder the thing most precious to us! Since the time of my ancestors, Lapis Canyon has been at the center of our beliefs, of everything we do!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_NEWWORLDBOY_000_026先祖代々崇拝してきた聖地を奪われてしまって、
みんな……みんな、絶望しているんだ……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_WHASTRACH_000_027<tab>Beliefs? Come now, don't be absurd! That blue substance you call the “lifeblood of the planet” is ceruleum, a type of fuel. It's not doing any good just sitting there underground.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_WHASTRACH_000_027君たちの間では確か、青の谷から染み出す液体は、
母なる大地の血液だと云われ、崇めていたね。
しかし、それは迷信……あれは青燐水、油の一種だ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_WHASTRACH_000_028<tab>Once I open a mine in Lapis Canyon, I hope to employ the Whalaqee, offering you all an opportunity to earn a proper wage.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_WHASTRACH_000_028かの地にも、このような精製所を建てて、
ワラキ族の者らを、労働者として雇うつもりだ。
より豊かで文明的な暮らしができるぞ？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_WHASTRACH_000_029<tab>When you realize what you've been missing all this time, you'll soon forget about your superstitions.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_WHASTRACH_000_029そうすれば、迷信なんかすぐに忘れて、
みんな目を覚ますことだろう。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_000_030<tab>How bloody dare you! Who are you to call them superstitions!? This is their way of life, and all you want to do is destroy it for the sake of your own greed!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_000_030断じて迷信などであるものか！
その信仰は、彼らの歴史であり、大切な文化だ！
何者にも勝手に奪う権利はない！！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_WHASTRACH_000_031<tab>I'm doing more for the Whalaqee than you ever will! I'm giving them a chance to build a better future for themselves. They can either be part of the modern world, or be left behind!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_WHASTRACH_000_031奪ってなどいるものか、与えているのだよ、チャンスをね。
遅かれ早かれ、文明化の波は押し寄せてくる。
ならば、少しでも早く波に乗るべきだ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_000_032<tab>That's not your decision to make!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_000_032<tab>それは彼らが選ぶことであって、強制することではない！！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_WHASTRACH_000_033<tab>What about the medicine!? That was a product of Eorzean society. Without it, they'd all be dead! And another thing─my investor funded its production for a share of the profits from my New World enterprise!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_WHASTRACH_000_033彼らの命を救った治療薬とて、文明の産物だろうに！
大体、すでに出資者もいるので、もう中止にはできない……！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_034<tab>(-Familiar Voice-)Darlings, darlings! There's no need to squabble!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_034<tab>(-ロイスの声-)その決着、ウチの闘技場で決めない……？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_035<tab>I admit it, I'm Whastrach's backer. It all started when I told him about Martyn's plan to save the Whalaqee from the epidemic. You see, the prospect of trading with the New World sounded rather promising, though this is the first I've heard of the ceruleum mine.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_035ヴァストラッハに出資してるのは、何を隠そう私なの。
新大陸を開拓する彼の商会に可能性を感じたんだけど、
まさか、青燐泉がワラキ族の聖地だなんて聞いてなかったわ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_036<tab>Expanding into new regions often leads to resistance from the locals, but this is far beyond what I was expecting. Whastrach─I don't like being kept in the dark. I'm seriously considering withdrawing from our deal!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_036地元民との対立という要素は、事業にとってのリスク。
このまま出資を継続すべきかどうか、悩みどころね……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_037<tab>That said, I can see this being a worthwhile venture, providing that the Whalaqee are not being exploited. But I also agree with Martyn that their way of life should not be disrupted. As you can see, this leaves me with a difficult choice...
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_037そもそも、ワラキ族の伝統が彼らだけのものであるように、
強制的な文明化も、ヴァストラッハの価値観でしかない。
言い争ったところで、結論なんて出ないでしょう。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_038<tab>Which is why I propose that the two of you settle this in the arena! Whastrach, you're a blue mage yourself, correct?
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_038なら、わかりやすく、闘技場で勝ち負けを決めましょうよ。
聞くところによると、ヴァストラッハも青魔道士なんでしょう？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_WHASTRACH_000_039<tab>I am indeed. Though I should warn you, Martyn was never a match for me, even before he was chewed up and spat out by one of your pets.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_WHASTRACH_000_039さすが耳ざといですね。
しかし、マーティンはこのとおり療養中の身、
まず勝負にならないかと……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_040<tab>Then perhaps it's time for his apprentice, “Azuro the Second,” to make <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> grand debut!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_040いまこそ、)) (( )) 02 /var>の出番よ！
マーティンの弟子であるあなたが、
二代目「マスク・ザ・ブルー」としてデビューするの！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_041<tab>I can picture it now─the ultimate clash of blue magic! The loyal disciple of the Great Azuro faces a mysterious challenger to determine who is the superior spellcaster!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_041そして、ヴァストラッハも謎の青魔道士としてデビューして、
ふたりで青魔道士の頂上決戦を行うの！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_042<tab>If <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> wins, I'll cut off my funding for the Lapis Canyon project, and the lands will return to their original owners. And if Whastrach is victorious, Martyn must act as intermediary for the Whalaqee and persuade them to agree to the development.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_042)) (( )) 02 /var>が勝てば、青の谷から手を引く。
ヴァストラッハが勝てば、マーティンがワラキ族を説得する。
対立した意見を収めるためには、良い提案だと思うけど……？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_000_043<tab>Royse, you can do what you like with that money of yours, but you can't expect me to go along with this!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_000_043<tab>そ、そんなことで決めてしまうなんて……

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_WHASTRACH_000_044<tab>For such an old-fashioned sort of fellow, Martyn seems to forget that disputes such as these have been decided by combat since ancient times.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_WHASTRACH_000_044おもしろいじゃないか。
歴史上でも意見の対立は、武力を以て決めるのが常。
闘技場での試合であれば、犠牲も出ない……実に文明的だ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_WHASTRACH_000_045<tab>I, for one, have no objections! Count me in!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_WHASTRACH_000_045<tab>その提案、乗りましょう！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_000_046<tab>What about the Whalaqee!? They should be the ones to decide their own fate, not us!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_000_046<tab>ちょっと、待ってください、この子の気持ちも……

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_NEWWORLDBOY_000_047<tab>You're right, Martyn, but we have a similar tradition. When two sides cannot reach an agreement, a representative from each takes part in a contest of strength.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_NEWWORLDBOY_000_047ワラキ族は、あらゆる自然を崇拝する。
そして、獣は、縄張りや群れの支配権を巡って争うもの……
土地を巡る決闘は、自然の生き方に適っているよ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_NEWWORLDBOY_100_048<tab>Ideally, one of my people would be chosen, but we are in Eorzea, and I have no choice but to ask you to participate on our behalf. So, will you do it, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_NEWWORLDBOY_100_048マーティンのお弟子さん、お願いします。
不躾ですが、僕たちワラキ族のために戦ってくれませんか？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_048<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_048<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_Q1_000_000<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_A1_000_001<tab>I'll fight─for what is right!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_A1_000_001<tab>ワラキ族のために戦う！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_A1_000_002<tab>I'll fight─for Martyn!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_A1_000_002<tab>マーティンのために戦う！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_A1_000_003<tab>What am I getting myself into?
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_049<tab>Very gallant of you, my dear! The crowd'll lap this up!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_049闘志むき出しでいい感じね！
これは盛り上がりそうだわ……！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_050<tab>What a noble way to express your gratitude to your mentor! Perhaps we can use this in the performance...
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_050稀に見る師弟愛ね！
これは盛り上がりそうだわ……！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_051<tab>I know, dear, it's a lot of responsibility. And for your debut match, no less! But as the boy says─it must be you.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_051迷っているのね。
とりあえず、マスクカーニバルで、
青魔道士としてデビューしてから、考えてみてくれない？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_052<tab>First things first, let's get you two into your costumes and take a look at that magic of yours. I want to know what my audience will be getting when the big day arrives. Come along!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_052でも、その前に青魔道士としての腕を見せてもらうわ。
ふたりの衣装合わせもしておかなきゃね。
ウルダハに戻って、予行演習をしましょう！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_000_055<tab>Bloody hells! How did we let Royse talk us into this?
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_000_055<tab>まったく……なぜ、こんな展開に……？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_WHASTRACH_000_056<tab>I've always liked you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, so it's a shame I'll have to give you a damned good thrashing in front of all of those people. I have a lot at stake, so don't expect me to hold anything back.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_WHASTRACH_000_056まさか、君と対決することになるとはね。
悪いがこちらもビジネスが懸かっているんで、
手加減するつもりはないよ……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_LATOOLJA_000_057<tab>Thank you for bringing Martyn back to Ul'dah. Latool Ja glad he unharmed, but he in very strange mood. Latool Ja want to know what is going on!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_LATOOLJA_000_057先生、を連れ戻してくれて、ありがとう、ございま、す……。
何やら、大変な事態、になった、とか……？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_NEWWORLDBOY_000_058<tab>Please, you must defeat Whastrach. He's a cruel, heartless man, so don't show him any mercy!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_NEWWORLDBOY_000_058どうか、どうか決闘で勝って、
ワラキ族の聖地を取り戻してください……！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_060<tab>Once you've both changed into your new costumes, I'll see you in the arena. This way, my darlings!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_060さて、予行演習はもちろん、
ウチの闘技場「ブルースカイ」で行うわよ！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_070<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, my dear! Are you ready?
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_070さあ、)) (( )) 02 /var>！
準備はいい！？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_LATOOLJA_100_070<tab>But you...missed...
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_LATOOLJA_100_070あ、あう……。
的が、ハズレ、てます、よ……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MAMOOLJASHOP_100_071<tab>Hahaha! No, Gaheel Ja not think so!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MAMOOLJASHOP_100_071ククク……。
大当たり、で、しょう……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_071<tab>Wonderful, my dear. It seems a new hero is born!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_071いいじゃない！
二代目「マスク・ザ・ブルー」の誕生ね！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_072<tab>Now it's Whastrach's turn. Pay close attention to the costume, darlings─it's my finest creation yet!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_072そして、お次は、ヴァストラッハ！
ウチの衣装係が、総力を挙げてこさえた自信作をご覧なさい！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MAMOOLJASHOP_100_072<tab>Such...power...
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MAMOOLJASHOP_100_072ぐ、ぐは……。
お、見事でし、た……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_073<tab>The dread warlock who transcends dimensions of time and space─Azulmagia!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_073完璧ね！
地獄からきた悪の青魔道士、その名も「アポカリョープス」！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_WHASTRACH_000_074<tab>Why must I be the villain?
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_WHASTRACH_000_074<tab>参ったな、私は悪役なのか……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_075<tab>It's all part of the act, my dear! What could be more thrilling than an epic struggle between good and evil?
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_075剣闘興行では、正統派と悪役のライバル関係が、
いちばん盛り上がるんだから……そこは我慢してよね！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_100_075<tab>You mean to tell me Whastrach is inside that thing? And why's he floatin'?
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_100_075驚いたな、ヴァストラッハの面影がまったくない……。
それも、宙に浮いているようだが……？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_100_076<tab>For dramatic effect, of course! If you must know, it's a ceruleum levitation device. Surprisingly cheap too. Apparently, there isn't much practical application for the ability to float a few ilms off of the ground.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_100_076飛空艇と同じ原理よ。
気化させた青燐水を充填した浮袋を仕込んでいるの。
ほかにも、仕掛けがあるんだけど、そこは企業秘密……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_WHASTRACH_100_077<tab>I'm still not convinced it's entirely necessary, and the costume is rather more flamboyant than I would've liked. But if I'm going to do this, I may as well enjoy myself. I'll show the audience what real blue magic looks like!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_WHASTRACH_100_077まさか、こんな格好をさせられるなんてね。
でも、やるからには、全力で演じさせてもらうよ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_076<tab>That's what I like to hear. It's sure to be a performance they'll never forget, right here at the Masked Carnivale!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_076さ、これにて予行演習は完了！
ふたりの決闘は、マスクカーニバルの頂上決戦になるわ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_100_078<tab>Not to put too fine a point on it, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> my dear, but I think you'd benefit from some practice before starring in the main event.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_100_078)) (( )) 02 /var>はまず、ほかの試合で手慣らしして、
いい頃合いに、アポカリョープスに挑んでちょうだい！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_WHASTRACH_100_079<tab>Hahaha! Train all you want─it will make no difference. Lapis Canyon is mine!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_WHASTRACH_100_079では、私は君の挑戦を待っているよ。
ククク……負ける気は微塵もない、部族の土地は私のものだ……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_000_080<tab>I still can't believe this is happenin'...
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_000_080<tab>まったく……なぜ、こんな展開に……？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_LATOOLJA_000_081<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s Glower very painful... Not refreshing, either. Only painful.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_LATOOLJA_000_081目、から、ビーム……
かな、り効きました、よ……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_NEWWORLDBOY_000_082<tab>Don't let Whastrach intimidate you. I know you can beat him!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_NEWWORLDBOY_000_082<tab>お願いします、聖地を取り戻してください……！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_090<tab>I'd say you're ready to take part in the Masked Carnivale, although I'd recommend testing your skills against less challenging opponents before facing Azulmagia.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_090さて、闘獣興行「マスクカーニバル」に出場したくなったら、
オニキスレーンにいる「ブルースカイの案内人」に声をかけて。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_091<tab>I have gathered quite the menagerie of exotic beasts, but you should choose with care. We try to call an end to the performance before either side incurs any serious injury, but as Martyn will attest, accidents can happen.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_091試合はいくつも用意してあるから、
あなたの裁量で選んで、適切な戦いに臨んでね。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_092<tab>Once you feel confident in your abilities, say the word and I will grant you and Azulmagia the opportunity to settle this feud. Until then, fight well, but don't do anything rash. I might struggle to find <var 1A 02 /var>another<var 1A 01 /var> replacement blue mage...
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_ROYSE_000_092それじゃあ、これから目いっぱい、
ウチの闘技場のマスクカーニバルを盛り上げてちょうだい！
「アポカリョープス」との決戦も健闘を祈ってるわ……！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_000_093<tab>That Royse... She's a real piece of work, ain't she? I s'pose if I'd seen this comin', we wouldn't be in this mess.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_000_093やれやれ……。
まさか、こんな展開になるとはね、
最後の試練を与えるはずが、それどころではなかったよ……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_NEWWORLDBOY_000_094<tab>It's up to you now, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_NEWWORLDBOY_000_094あなただけが頼りです。
どうか、聖地を取り戻してください……！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_000_095<tab>He's right. If only I hadn't been damn near killed in that bloody show, I could've dealt with him myself. Well, I'd like to think I'd have a chance of winnin', but he was always the better mage.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_000_095確かに、こうなった以上、君に頼るほかないようだ。
身体が万全であれば、私が戦いたいところだが、
すまない……不甲斐ない師を許してくれ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_100_095<tab>To be honest, though, I think you've got a real talent for blue magic. In fact, you shouldn't be scared of Whastrach─he should be scared of you!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_100_095ヴァストラッハは強いが、いまや君も、
どこに出しても恥ずかしくない、一流の青魔道士となった！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_000_096<tab>With the right spells, I reckon you'll be able to take him down a peg or two. Now get out there and show him what you're made of!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_000_096数多の青魔法を駆使して「アポカリョープス」を倒し、
どうか、ワラキ族の聖地を取り戻してくれ！
頼んだぞ、)) (( )) 02 /var>……！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_000_097<tab>Ugh... Look at me, gettin' all worked up like that. I'd better head back before the chirurgeon realizes I've gone. Hopefully I'll be allowed out of the infirmary to watch some of your performances, though. Best of luck, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_MARTYN_000_097ふう……やはり無理がたたってしまったか。
申し訳ないが、私は療養に戻らせてもらう。
君の試合は、客席からしっかり応援させてもらうよ……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_SYSTEM_000_100<tab>The Masked Carnivale has been unlocked. To participate, speak with the Celestium attendant in Onyx Lane.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ500_03198_SYSTEM_000_100青魔道士コンテンツ「マスクカーニバル」が開放されました。
オニキスレーンにいる「ブルースカイの案内人」から、
挑戦することができます。
